sentences.en: Alan sings with shy intensity, hiding behind the security blanket of his guitar.
sentences.cn: 艾伦非常害羞地唱着，用怀里的吉他挡住自己以获得此许安全感。

sentences.en: But everyone I know who kept it up at that intensity is burnt out.
sentences.cn: 我所认识的每个一直保持那种强度的人都劳累过度。

sentences.en: He is doing research on radiant intensity.
He was watching her with an intensity that was unnerving.
sentences.cn: 他用一种令她心慌的专注神情看着她。

sentences.en: His intensity and the ferocity of his feelings alarmed me.
sentences.cn: 他感情之激烈和狂暴都让我惊恐。

sentences.en: It was so unlike him to say something like that, with such intensity, that I was astonished.
sentences.cn: 他一反常态用如此强烈的语气说出那番话，着实让我吃惊。

sentences.en: Speech is made up of sound waves that vary in frequency and intensity.
sentences.cn: 语音是由不同频率和强度的声波组成的。

sentences.en: The books that result have intensity and a fascinating immediacy, far beyond that of ordinary narrative.
sentences.cn: 结果写出来的书情节紧张，矛盾冲突强烈，令人欲罢不能，效果与使用普通的叙事手法大为不同。

sentences.en: The intensity of the blaze shattered windows, spraying glass on the streets below.
sentences.cn: 熊熊烈火灼裂了玻璃窗，碎玻璃飞溅到了下面的街道上。

sentences.en: The intensity of the coherent light builds up very rapidly.
sentences.cn: 相干光的强度迅速地增大.

sentences.en: The intensity of the hurricane was frightening.
sentences.cn: 飓风的猛烈程度令人恐惧。

sentences.en: The intensity of the work left little room for personal grief or anxiety.
sentences.cn: 高强度的工作使人几乎没空去悲伤或者忧虑。

sentences.en: The radiation intensity through the motor is determined with a scintillation counter.
sentences.cn: 通过发动机的放射强度可用闪光计数器来确定.

sentences.en: Under high intensity stocking a sheep's worst enemy is another sheep.
sentences.cn: 在高密度载畜的条件下,一只羊的最危险的敌人是另一只羊.

sentences.en: When a surface is perpendicular to the rays, their intensity is at its maximum.
sentences.cn: 当表面与射线垂直时，射线的强度最大。

words.tran_cn: 强烈的；紧张的；非常的；热情的
加强的；集中的；透彻的；加强语气的
强度，烈度；加强，加剧；紧张
使加强，使强化；使变激烈

phrases.tran_cn: 强度分布；强度分析；亮度分布
劳动强度，劳力投入密集度
降雨强度；降水强度；暴雨强度
应力强度因子；应力强度因数

trans.tran_cn: 强烈，（感情的）强烈程度，强度，烈度
trans.tran_en: the quality of being felt very strongly or having a strong effect
